Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Stellar Mercury 001 Elite - Fire Red, Maple Flametop Singlecut Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · Pre-owned: This guitar has some oxidation on the toggle switch, input jack nut, and hardware. The guitar is in working electronic condition and besides the oxidation looks great. Light your fire with this Stellar guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick maple flametop cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. As if this guitar having a maple flametop isn’t already enough, it’s also stained with a vibrant red that makes it look on fire! The guitar has vintage white binding on the front of the body as well as the neck and headstock. The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar OSR humbucker pickups. These pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Classic looking guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick maple flametop cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark brown rosewood fret board. Specs Body: Maple flametop and mahogany body, cream binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, cream binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, cream binding Electronics: x2 Stellar OSR humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, chrome hardware MER001P-FRRD22
Title: Stellar Mercury 001 Elite - Fire Red, Maple Flametop Singlecut Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: This guitar has oxidation on its hardware that does not effect playability
